query.statement:
WITH TMP AS( SELECT MATNR, MATNR_NM, MANDT, ZSIZE, SPEC, DZEINR FROM SAPHEE.MARA WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND MATNR LIKE #MATNR#||'%'
AND MATNR_NM LIKE '%'||#MATNR_NM#||'%'
)
SELECT DISTINCT A.MATNR AS MATNR , A.MATNR_NM AS MATNR_NM , B.NAME1 AS NAME1 , (C.NETPR*100) AS NETPR , A.ZSIZE AS ZSIZE , A.SPEC AS SPEC , A.DZEINR AS DZEINR , B.LIFNR AS LIFNR FROM ( SELECT A.MATNR, A.MATNR_NM, B.INFNR, B.LIFNR, B.LOEKZ, A.MANDT, A.ZSIZE, A.SPEC, A.DZEINR FROM TMP AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.EINA AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.MATNR = B.MATNR ) AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.LFA1 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = B.LIFNR INNER JOIN SAPHEE.EINE AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.INFNR = C.INFNR WHERE A.LOEKZ = '' AND B.LOEVM = '' AND B.SPERM = '' AND C.LOEKZ = '' AND B.LIFNR <> '2148898192'
